title: The Age of Strife
content: The fragmentation of the cosmos; the Earth is caught within the tumult.

title: The Age of Ash
content: The conflict between the Gods leads to a seismic event that engulfs the world in a great ash cloud for 53 years.

title: The Dragon Cull
content: Humanity blames dragons for the catastrophic events and hunts them into disappearance.

title: The Invention of Cold Fire
content: People make great magical and technological advances in order to adapt in desperate times.

title: The Midnight War
content: States and kingdoms wage war over the scarce resources in a world benighted by the impenetrable ash.
sub_title: The Great War Fought in Darkness

title: The Dogs of War
content: Developments in vivisection and chirurgy to create chimeric hounds that ravage the land.

title: The False Peace
content: A time of fragile peace brought about by the lifting of the ash and the eventual end of the War; an age when dragons return.
sub_title: The Ash Lifts and the War Ends

title: The Ash Lifts
content: The return of the light; the re-emergence of plant life.

title: The End of the Midnight War
content: The final days of conflict and the cessation of hostilities between human territories.

title: The Day of Wrath
content: The final battle of the Midnight War; the disastrous hubris of humanity and the vengeance of dragons.

title: The Resurgence of Dragons
content: The ascendancy of vengeful dragons.

title: The Death of Mushrooms
content: The erosion of ecological vestiges from the age of darkness.

title: The Age of False Gods
content: The growing influence of draconic cults; the proliferation of multiple sects.

title: The Proliferation of Cults
content: The emergence of many different factions that worship different dragons.

title: The Draconic Ascendency
content: The consolidation of the most powerful cult of dragon worshippers.

title: The Resurgent Strife
content: Renewed war between the Gods; the Great Separation of the Continents; renewed upheaval and calamity.
sub_title: The End of the False Peace

title: The Great Separation
content: The shattering of the continents; the sundering of the Great Seas.

title: The Flight of the Dragons
content: The vanishing of the dragons; the fear of a second great cull.

title: The Age of Ruin
content: Renewed fervour for dragon worship; expanding influence of cults.

title: The Rise of Fýrsu
content: The growth of the Cult of Fýrsu; the awaiting of her return.

title: The Long Decay
content: The abandonment of the old Gods; a rejection of their conflict.
sub_title: The Last Temple Falls to Ruin
